p: Essential oils from other plants, such as essential oil of Mentha citrata Ehrh., Artemisia annua L. and Citrus medica L., were found to have antibacterial activities. Essential oil of Mentha citrata Ehrh. had significant antibacterial activity at 0.5 mg/mL against S. aureus [ 15]. The MIC of the essential oil from Artemisia annua L. against S. aureus was 10 mg/mL [ 16]. The essential oil from fruits of Citrus medica L. had the MIC of 1.56 mg/mL against S. aureus [ 17]. In this work, SEO was found to have antibacterial activity against S. aureus (MIC = 0.2 mg/mL). The smaller MIC value indicates the better antibacterial activity of essential oil. The results showed that SEO had better antibacterial activities than essential oils of other plants, such as Mentha citrata Ehrh., Artemisia annua L. and Citrus medica L.
